LanguageData.Celsius_MountainTemperatureMode_Vanilla_: Mountains provide a constant underground temperature (similar to vanilla behaviour).
LanguageData.Celsius_MountainTemperatureMode_AnnualAv: Mountains provide a stable temperature throughout the year, which is determined by the map's climate.
LanguageData.Celsius_MountainTemperatureMode_SeasonAv: Mountains provide a temperature that gradually changes with season.
LanguageData.Celsius_MountainTemperatureMode_AmbientA: Mountains have no special thermal effect, their temperature is the same as ambient outdoor temperature.
LanguageData.Celsius_MountainTemperatureMode_Manual_t: Set mountain temperature to your wishes.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_Vanilla_tooltip: Use vanilla color scheme for heat overlay instead of Celsius'.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_ShowTempTooltip_tooltip: When heat overlay is on, show a tooltip next to the cursor with the cell's exact temperature.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_FreezingAndMelting_tool: Water can freeze, and ice can melt into water.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_AdvAutoignition_tooltip: Flammable things can spontaneously catch fire when they get too hot. Replaces vanilla autoignition.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_PawnWeatherEffects_tool: Wind chill and wetness affect comfortable temperatures.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_TempDisplayDigits_toolt: How many digits to print after point for temperatures. Default value: {0}.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_TakeOwnRisk: Change the values below at your own risk.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_UpdateInterval_tooltip: How often map temperatures are updated. Lower values improve accuracy, higher values improve performance. 1 real time second = 60 ticks at normal speed. Recommended value: {0} ticks.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_ConvectionConductivityE: How much air convection increases air conductivity. Recommended value: {0}.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_EnvironmentDiffusion_to: How strongly environment (e.g. outdoor) temperature affects cell temperatures. Recommended value: {0}.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_RoofInsulation_tooltip: How well roofs (constructed and natural) preserve indoor temperature. Recommended value: {0}.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_HeatPush_tooltip: Effect of things that produce or reduce heat (e.g. fires, heaters and coolers).
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_Threading_tooltip: Whether to use multithreading for parts of the main loop. Requires a good amount of cores (>4) to be faster than single threading.
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_NumThreadWorkers_toolti: How many threads to use for the "big" parts of the map. The more the better, but higher values could lead to more frequent GC cylces. 16-48 is recommended
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_ComplexThreading_toolti: Whether to use a different amount of threads to the "small" parts of the map. Could lead to better performance if said number is set correctly, but will absolutely trash your TPS if you mess it up
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_NumThreadBuffer_tooltip: How many threads to use for the "small" parts of the map. Can degrade performance if set too high. WILL DEFINITELY DEGRADE PERFORMANCE IF IT DOESN'T EVENTLY DIVIDE THE AMOUNT OF WORKER THREADS! 16-48 is recommended
LanguageData.Celsius_Settings_DebugMode_tooltip: Verbose logging of Celsius' work. Required for bug reports.
